title: go.blog/context Example fails when host uses IPv6
body:
by **pnasrat@google.com**: 
What does 'go version' print?

go version go1.3 darwin/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. go get -d code.google.com/p/go.blog/content/context/server
2. cd go/src/code.google.com/p/go.blog/content/context/server
3. go build .
4. ./server
5. In a browser go to http://localhost:8080/search?q=golang&;timeout=1s


What happened?

userip "[::1]:61136" is not IP:port

What should have happened instead?

List of go search results
